attr.title: Quakespasm
attr.desc:
QuakeSpasm -- A modern, cross-platform Quake game engine by sezero (Ozkan Sezer) based on FitzQuake by John Fitzgibbons. This source port of quake supports many mods and Dimension of the Machine. GL video accelerated with GL4ES!

GL4ES version used: https://github.com/Slayer366/quakespasm-for-GL4ES based on https://github.com/jfgomez21/quakespasm who first modified sezero's Quakespasm to work with GL4ES

GL4ES by ptitseb (same dev who also does box86 and box64) can be found here: https://github.com/ptitSeb/gl4es
attr.inst: You will need to populate the id1, hipnotic, rogue, dopa, ad, and mg1 directories with your pak files and music tracks.  Some JelOS users may need to use flac instead of ogg or mp3.  It is recommended to use an RK3566 or faster CPU to run Arcane Dimensions or Dimension of the Machine.
